body: Well, he did say it didn't matter what she did with the guy. Probably should have been more specific.
I wish there was a "Happy NTR" tag where it's better for everyone that it happened instead of stuff like this getting shoved in with normal evil NTR.

This is not NTR. The husband wasn't even shown after the first page. And it didn't showed woman getting mind break , husband cry. The woman was a whore to begin with. And then at the end she divorced him and stayed with the other guy. So to me it's not NTR.
You bunch of retards, it's not netorare. It's netori. Netorare: when the MC gets his girl stolen by sex. Netori: When the MC is alpha and steals someone else's girl using sex.
Meh.
Not NTR, just cheating. And the guy is pretty nice :D

This dude has a decent basis, but get's ruined by the art. You can't combine NTR with comedy, it just doesn't work. Tsuyatsuya as a comparison is also unfappable for the most part, but at least his art comes close to sanbuns gritty feeling, so you can actually take his works serious. This on the other hand is just... unfappable AND not worth to even read. And to top it of - this is fucking netori, with a cucklord as the MC. Would've been 1000x better if the husband and asian john lennon were swapped.

NTR is a global term for NeToRare (girl stolen), NeToRi (stealing girl) and NeToRase (actual cuck). All three are meant to trigger in readers feelings of jealousy and anger, this piece is no different, hence why it has the NTR tag. For convenience sake, this site uses just the "netorare" tag because having a 3 letter tag would be obtuse, and having 3 different tags for works that usually fall under more than two categories would just be silly.

In the end: this is a work of fiction, please abstain to shit yourself over anime porn of all things.
im confused but...happy ending?

Duhh,married with a used up good...and worse,she is a PORN STAR??..LoL,i bet if that weak guy goin out,some guy blackmail his wife then it will become netorare..she will enjoy it because she is a slut before..The End...porn star and used up slut dont deserve to get married..they will easily cheating especially with a dark past

@Iexpectedbetter, then why don't you explain the major difference, instead of spouting completely unnecessary hostility? What makes such a huge difference between netori and netorare? They're both NTR. They're both ultimately "lover gets stolen". 'Depressing mood/tone' is not part of the definition. 'Bad ending' is not part of the definition. 'Mind break' and/or 'becoming sex slave of someone else' is not part of the definition. What makes it so different? Your response just utterly disappoints me. Frankly, I expected better.
Lol he's retarded like that same shit won't happen to him
Heh nice happy ending
@Suckamatulu, it is netori, but that tag doesn't exist here, so netorare is used instead. After all, the only difference is just the perspective of the story being told. It's still NTR, regardless.
Shouldn't it be Netori since MC is stealing the girl?

@Sir Dragon, it doesn't matter. She got stolen. It's just not FROM but BY the protagonist in this case, but she still got stolen. It's NTR. The ones you're used to, that are ugly and heartbreaking, are just what the authors of those one enjoys making. This is still NTR.

This really shouldn't have am NTR tag, ntr is always so ugly and makes you feel Bad , this one was pretty happy and you didn't even know the guy she was married to in the beginning very well , so it's not like you pity him either
